item.title: Bitcoin Charity Campaign For Edward Snowden Launched At BitHope
item.description:
Bitcoin Charity Campaign For Edward Snowden Launched At BitHope

Bitcoin donations platform BitHope.org has posted a petition urging people to donate to Edward Snowden. Remarkably, the petition's authors decided to raise just one BTC to send it to the former contractor of U.S. intelligence. At the moment of writing, they managed to raise 0.7889 BTC.

item.title: German Media Falsely Links Bitcoin and Darknet To Munich Shooting
item.description:
German Media Falsely Links Bitcoin and Darknet To Munich Shooting

All of this seems to be another attempt by mainstream media to discredit Bitcoin and cryptocurrency. Bitcoin is once again making headline news related to a terror attack. According to German media outlets, the weapon used in the Munich shooting has been purchased from the darknet.

item.title: Ethereum 'Classic' Plummets; Bitcoin's Ennui Grows
item.description:
Ethereum 'Classic' Plummets; Bitcoin's Ennui Grows

Ethereum Classic lost more than US $25 million in market value at one point earlier in the evening, bringing the total market capitalization of the beleaguered crypto asset below US $50 million briefly. 'Classic' is an activist variant of the Ethereum protocol, except one where the community's most recent hard fork never took place.

item.title: Breakout Gaming Making Progress on New eSports Platform
item.description:
Breakout Gaming Making Progress on New eSports Platform

Breakout gaming, the team behind the new Breakout Coin (BRK) and Breakout Stake (BRX), is making progress with its new player-vs-player (PVP) eSports platform, creating what they call "an attractive use-case for BRK beyond trading." Disclaimer: This article was provided by Bitcoin PR Buzz.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 07/25/2016 - New Trend Forming - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 07/25/2016 - New Trend Forming - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price could be ready to resume its dive since technical signals are indicating that bearish pressure is in play. Bitcoin Price Key Highlights Bitcoin price could be ready to resume its dive since technical signals are indicating that bearish pressure is in play.

item.title: How can I mine bitcoins in the darkweb?
item.description:
How can I mine bitcoins in the darkweb?

Answer (1 of 2): Clear web or darkweb, you can not mine Bitcoin on any environment. Minning bitcoin = using machines (CPU/GPU) and electricity, this has nothing to do with a website, with a Tor hidden network or whatever. People are spending and earning Bitcoin in darkweb as a currency, for (mo...

item.title: Bitcoin News for the week of 7/18/16
item.description:
Bitcoin News for the week of 7/18/16

Welcome to our weekly bitcoin news recap, where we cover top headlines and stories in the world of bitcoin each week. We take another look at the price of bitcoin this week which has been very stable since the halving when the block reward reduced by 50%.

item.title: Bitcoin vs USD vs Gold: Here's Why Bitcoin Wins
item.description:
Bitcoin vs USD vs Gold: Here's Why Bitcoin Wins

This post was originally posted on January 2015. Now, 18 months later it's time to revisit the facts: Bitcoin's price is on a downtrend, the dollar is strong, and even Microsoft's adoption combined with a crumbling ruble isn't picking up the slack.

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Is This A Correction? - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Is This A Correction? - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price is currently struggling to hold the recent bullish bias, and it looks like there is a chance of another dip after a minor move higher. Ethereum price is currently struggling to hold the recent bullish bias, and it looks like there is a chance of another dip after a minor move higher.

item.title: As Mining Expands, Will Electricity Consumption Constrain Bitcoin?
item.description:
As Mining Expands, Will Electricity Consumption Constrain Bitcoin?

Since the modern economy has gone digital, it has come to require more electricity. Peter Kelly-Detwiler, co-founder of NorthBridge Energy Partners, LLC, a consulting firm that helps companies connect assets to power grids, examined the impact that expanding cryptocurrency is having on energy consumption in a recent Forbes article.
